page.title: 05Woods in the Bodenham area
page.content: There are 5 large woodland areas and a number of smaller areas of wood. These are broadleaved deciduous trees with the exception of one commercial conifer wood. Venns Wood, 21 acres, mature broadleaves mainly oak. Sling Coppice and Ashgrove Wood, 9.82 acres, mainly ash and scrub. Westfield Wood, 15 acres(approx.), mixed deciduous trees. Burling Coppice, 12 acres(approx.) conifers. All of these woods are privately owned and none belong to the Forestry Commission. The smaller areas of woodland total about 10 acres. The orchards in this area are mostly mature cider apple.
